FixedPointParameter.Name: mult_ctr
FixedPointParameter.Description: Factor to determine noise activity for updating the noise estimation. Class I. Min=0x0800 Max=0x4000 Default=0x1000

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_thr1
FixedPointParameter.Description: Noise level threshold at which ANA start to work. Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000 Default=0xC700

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_thr2
FixedPointParameter.Description: Noise threshold for second segment of gain estimation. Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000 Default=0xCE00

FixedPointParameter.Name: ratio_1
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope of the gain estimation for lower noise. Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x4000

FixedPointParameter.Name: ratio_2
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope of the gain estimation for higher noise. Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x2AAA

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_l_a
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for expander (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000 Default=0xCC00

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_l_b
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for compression factor to update control signal during noise activity (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000 Default=0xEA00

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_g_comp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Gain at L_B (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x6000 Default=0x1000

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_r_infa
FixedPointParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in minimum detector for falling signals (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x01CD

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_r_ab
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope for input level greater than L_A and lower than L_B (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x00F3

FixedPointParameter.Name: lb_r_b0
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope for input level > L_B (low band or single band compressor). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x004D

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_l_a
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for expander (high band). Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000 Default=0xBA00

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_l_b
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for compression factor to update control signal during noise activity (high band). Class I Min=0xA000 Max=0x0000. Default=0xDD00

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_g_comp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Gain at L_B (high band). Class I. Min=0xA000 Max=0x6000 Default=0x1800

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_r_infa
FixedPointParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in minimum detector for falling signals (high band). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x01CD

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_r_ab
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope for input level greater than L_A and lower than L_B (high band). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x00F3

FixedPointParameter.Name: hb_r_b0
FixedPointParameter.Description: Slope for input level > L_B (high band). Class I. Min=0x0000 Max=0x394A Default=0x004D

IntegerParameter.Name: m
IntegerParameter.Description: Subframe size to compute 'energy' of UL signal. Class II. Default=0x0010

FixedPointParameter.Name: env_decay
FixedPointParameter.Description: Time constant for envelope estimation during energy decrease. Class II. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x77BE

FixedPointParameter.Name: env_attack
FixedPointParameter.Description: Time constant for envelope estimation during energy increase. Class II. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x68CB

FixedPointParameter.Name: n_decay
FixedPointParameter.Description: Time constant for noise estimation when energy of signal decreased. Class II. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x7EB9

FixedPointParameter.Name: n_attack
FixedPointParameter.Description: Time constant for noise estimation when energy of signal increased. Class II. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x7FF6

FixedPointParameter.Name: update_ctr
FixedPointParameter.Description: Factor to update control signal during noise activity. Class II. Min=0x4000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x4052

FixedPointParameter.Name: ctr_decay
FixedPointParameter.Description: Factor to decrease the ctr variable when the envelope is lower than ctr. Class II. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x0000
